name: Whole Wheat Bread
description: A common type of bread made from whole wheat flour.

name: White Bread
description: A type of bread made from refined white flour.

name: Quinoa
description: A gluten-free grain alternative often used as a side dish or in salads.

name: Rice
description: A versatile grain that comes in many varieties, commonly used as a side dish.

name: Oatmeal
description: A breakfast cereal made from oats, often enjoyed with milk or water.

name: Corn Tortillas
description: Gluten-free flatbreads made from ground corn, commonly used in Mexican cuisine.

name: Pasta
description: A popular Italian dish made from durum wheat or gluten-free alternatives like rice or quinoa.

name: Couscous
description: A North African grain dish made from crushed durum wheat.

name: Barley
description: A grain often used in soups and stews, rich in fiber.

name: Gluten-Free Crackers
description: Snack crackers made from gluten-free grains like rice or quinoa.
